content.question: Using the excerpts, respond to parts a, b, and c. Briefly describe one major difference between Gordon-Reed’s and Breen’s interpretations of the American Revolution. Briefly explain how one specific event or development from 1763 to 1800 not explicitly mentioned in the excerpts could be used to support Gordon-Reed’s interpretation. Briefly explain how one specific event or development from 1763 to 1800 not explicitly mentioned in the excerpts could be used to support Breen’s interpretation.

frqParts.text: Using the excerpts, respond to parts a, b, and c. Briefly describe one major difference between Gordon-Reed’s and Breen’s interpretations of the American Revolution. skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
